# dense_features

## Dense Features

## Description
 Retrives the Dense Features from a spec. 


## Usage
```r
 
dense_features(spec) 
```

## Arguments
|Arguments|Description|
|---|---|
| spec | A feature specification created with `feature_spec()`. |



## Value
 A list of feature columns.
